snippet.title: Removing lead to prevent poisoning
snippet.description: ...Lead poisoning is a serious problem for children, wildlife, and people who work in industries like battery manufacturing. Lead poisoning can permanently damage the central nervous system, kidneys, and various other organs. Children are particularly susceptible to elevated levels of lead...
